main.name: Matthew DeMaio
main.description: I am passionate about developing backend systems and simplifying complex processes. My current goal is to land a Backend Developer position utilizing golang and gRPC
main.bio: I enjoy working and experiencing what life has to offer as well. When it comes to working, I especially like working on backend systems dealing with data and APIs. Lately golang and gRPC have been the big technologies I've been focusing on. In my free time I enjoy games, coding, and working out. During the winter you can catch me snowboarding in the mountains.
main.contactmessage: Fill out the below form to contact me regarding any question, thanks!

education.description: School really helped build the fundementals of programming for me, without this knowledge it would of been a lot harder to learn complex processes. Although the classes did not go into crazy depth, they continuously built upon programming fundamentals.

work.title: Backend Developer
work.description: Develop and maintain in-house web application utilized by IT and various production departments across the company as a solo developer. Develop custom scripts and perform updates to existing scripts for our ERP system NetSuite. These scripts support custom pages which production workers use daily to perform their job duties. Development is done mostly utilizing Golang, Python, SQL, and JavaScript. Git is used for version control on all projects. Azure is used to automate builds and deployments to windows server and IIS.

work.title: Application Developer
work.description: Develop/Maintain an in-house web application, utilized by teams in QC, QA, and R&D. The web application utilizes the .Net framework, ASP .net Web Form, C#, SQL Server, T-SQL, HTML5, JavaScript, jQuery, CSS, Bootstrap 3, and Crystal Report. The in-house application is used to automate the data capture process, as well as provide emailed reports/notices about day to day activities based on user entries. Maintain Global Intranet, utilizing the Dot Net Nuke Framework.
